duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist residents with personal hygiene, medication management, and toileting, ensuring their comfort and well-being.
Communicate with medical staff, reporting on residents' health and providing emotional support to residents and their families.
Monitor and record vital signs, observing and reporting any abnormal changes in body functioning to a supervisor.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent, Valid CNA certification or State/Local equivalent required, CPR/First Aid Certification desired
